testcase.name: CreateTicketScenarioNegative
testcase.system-out: Clicked the 'Allow' button. Clicked the 'Skip' button. ✅ Generated Mobile Number: 98882470244 ✅ Entered Mobile Number: 98882470244 Name 'venky' has been entered into the 'Enter your name' field. Email 'vkautomationtesting@gmail.com' has been entered into the 'Enter your email' field. Clicked on the 'Select issue type' ImageView. Clicked on the 'Login issue' ImageView. Clicked on the 'Confirm' TextView. Entered the issue description into the 'Write your issue here...' field. Successfully clicked the 'Upload Image' button. Successfully clicked the 'Choose from gallery' button. Successfully clicked the ImageView with resource-id 'icon_thumbnail'. ✅ Successfully clicked the 'Submit' button. ✅ Validation Error Message Displayed (expected): Enter valid mobile number
